page.title: 08Produce Nursery, Halland
page.content: Staverton Nursery, is situated on the busy A22. It is a family concern that has been in business for nineteen years. On the 21 acres of land are grown mainly soft fruit, some vegetables and flowers. Neighbouring farmers supply the nursery with extra produce. The family also runs a small grocery store on the site which sells all basic food requirements. The nearest competition is about three miles away in Uckfield. Trade comes from the few local residents but mainly from travellers on the A22. Business is notably better in the summer months with the increased amount of tourists drawn to or through the area. The best seller is soft fruit.At this time, staff numbers may be temporarily increased from the normal three employees, excluding family.
